text: Is there a max number of options we can push to a dropdown list?
Hey all, qq - does the option to save and retrieve email templates exist in HubSpot (API or without) if the user doesn't have marketing pro or sales pro?
E.g if I make a private app for a client that sends 1 email, but they ONLY have ops hub pro
But if I wanted to avoid needing to use transactional email API
How might I check if this is possible?
